title: Tyson Fury vs Arslanbek Makhmudov: Briton says he will 'make boxing great again' with return
description: Showman Tyson Fury says he is "coming back to make boxing great again" as he prepares to fight Russia's Arslanbek Makhmudov in April.
content:
Ringmaster Tyson Fury was back to his old tricks, declaring he is "coming back to make boxing great again" and promising to bring his own brand of "circus" to the sport.

title: US build-up of warships and fighter jets tracked near Iran
description: BBC Verify has seen US aircraft carrier USS Abraham Lincoln near Iran ahead of talks between the two countries
content:
BBC Verify has confirmed the location of US aircraft carrier the USS Abraham Lincoln near Iran using satellite imagery, as Washington continues to put pressure on the country over its military program and recent deadly crackdown on protesters.

title: Robert Duvall: Actor who starred in The Godfather dies aged 95
description: The Oscar-winner died "peacefully" at his home in Middleburg, Virginia, on Sunday, his family says.
content:
Robert Duvall, who starred in The Godfather and Apocalypse Now, has died at the age of 95, according to US news reports.
The Oscar winner died "peacefully" at his home in Middleburg, Virginia, on Sunday, according to a statement sent by his PR agency... [1291 chars]

title: Referee Chris Kavanagh and assistant Nick Greenhalgh stood down after Newcastle FA Cup mistakes
description: Referee Chris Kavanagh and his assistant Nick Greenhalgh have not been selected for a Premier League game this weekend.
content:
Referee Chris Kavanagh and his assistant Nick Greenhalgh have not been selected for a Premier League game this weekend.

title: 'Potential fraud' investigated at closed PM Law firm
description: A regulatory body says it is investigating after the closure of PM Law.
content:
A law firm which left tens of thousands of people in limbo when it closed suddenly is being investigated by the regulator in connection with a potential fraud.
